thread.title: El Cid Vacations Club Recommends Visiting the Historical Town of Concordia
thread.title_full: El Cid Vacations Club Recommends Visiting the Historical Town of Concordia

author: Media Relations
title: El Cid Vacations Club Recommends Visiting the Historical Town of Concordia
text:
Members of El Cid Vacations Club get to enjoy myriad luxuries at their home away from home, such as quality customer service and top-notch amenities. They can also take advantage of staying in some prime locations in Mazatlán, a resurging cultural center on the Pacific Coast of Mexico. While staying in Mazatlán, guests should take the opportunity to see the beauty of the surrounding area, says El Cid Vacations Club. The area has some truly picturesque places tourists can visit, including the serene town of Concordia. Located about 30 miles east of Mazatlán, Concordia is quaint town full of a wealth of culture and history.
Concordia means “harmony,” and visitors can definitely feel the town’s ancient architecture and beautiful greenery come together to create a sense of peace. El Cid Vacations Club says the town is full of colonial-style homes and narrow cobbled streets, and its Catholic heritage is made apparent by what is considered Concordia’s architectural jewel, the Church of San Sebastian, which was built in the 18th century.
The approximately 10,000 inhabitants in Concordia are engaged in various ancestral hand-crafted works, including woodworking, pottery and agriculture. El Cid Vacations Club says Concordia and the surrounding villages in the Sierra Madre Mountains foothills are famous for the manufacture of all types of wooden furniture made from indigenous trees.
According to El Cid Vacations Club, visitors can taste the delicious traditional dishes at local restaurants in Concordia. The town also has options for lodging in case a day trip turns into longer stay. With the friendliness of the locals and the relaxing nature of village life, travelers may just want a bit more time to experience Concordia at their leisure.
El Cid Vacations Club is a global leader in the vacation ownership and resort industry, delivering a wide variety of memorable vacation experiences for members. El Cid Vacations Club continually strives to enhance its member services and guest experiences. Members are now invited to take advantage of downloading the complimentary El Cid Vacations Club Member mobile app available on both the App Store and Google Play . This application allows members to stay up to date on the most recent news, make reservations, and always stay in contact with El Cid Vacations Club. This is the perfect opportunity for El Cid Vacations Club members to plan their next dream vacation at one of the many stunning El Cid properties. For more information, visit http://www.elcidvacationsclub.com .
